ACT
228
Entries in the land register and delivery of movable property
In the inheritance decision, the court will determine that after the inheritance decision becomes final, the necessary entries are made in the land registry in accordance with the rules of land registry law.
In the decision on inheritance, the court will determine that after the decision on inheritance becomes final, the movable property that is stored with the court, a public notary, or on their order with a third party, shall be handed over to the authorized persons.
If the will mandates the heir to fulfill or secure obligations for the benefit of persons who are not capable of taking care of their rights and interests on their own, or for the purpose of achieving some general purpose, the court will determine the necessary security measures.
